update-collateral-form.title: Update collateral
update-collateral-form.description: Update the collateral for a stablecoin

amount.title: Enter Amount
amount.description: Input the amount you wish to update the collateral to. Ensure the amount is bigger or equal to the current supply.

amount.description: Input the amount you wish to mint.

amount.title: Enter Amount
amount.description: Input the amount you wish to burn.

grant-role-form.title: Grant Role
grant-role-form.description: Grant roles to a new admin

address.title: Select New Admin
address.description: Search for a user by their name or email, or manually enter a wallet address.

roles.title: Select Admin Roles
roles.description: Choose the roles to grant to the new admin. At least one role must be selected.

summary.title: Review and confirm role grant
summary.description: Verify the details of your role grant before proceeding.

basics.private-token-description: Other organisations won't see this asset

errors.formError: An error occurred while processing your request. Please try again later.
errors.unknown: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
errors.validation: The form contains invalid data. Please check your inputs.
errors.network: Network error. Please check your connection and try again.
errors.permission: You don't have permission to perform this action.
errors.notFound: The requested resource was not found.
errors.timeout: The request timed out. Please try again.
errors.server: Server error. Our team has been notified.
errors.unauthorized: You need to be logged in to perform this action.
errors.forbidden: You don't have enough permissions to perform this action.
errors.conflict: This operation conflicts with the current state. Please refresh and try again.
errors.invalidInput: One or more input fields contain invalid data.
errors.insufficientFunds: Insufficient funds to complete this transaction.

transaction.invalidNonce: Invalid transaction sequence. Please try again.
